title: Patch Error 003
body: when i try to update the game it keeps showing me that something is wrong this the servers and its preventing me from patching {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body: Hmmmmm it looks like this 003 error is plaguing a good number of players this morning. I've heard a force repatch hasn't been able to help like it normally would, but if you have the time try running the [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) with **reinstall and clean uninstall** turned on. Let me know how that goes!
